attributes.action: David Cameron should resign for linking homosexuals and paedofiles
attributes.additional_details:
after making the assumption on public television today of linking paedofillia and homosexuality is this politician
for real is he in the real world ? I feel let down that a man in charge of this country does not know the difference
i now feel iam going too be associated with this stigma
and he is going too start a impossible association now
He should make a full apology and resign
